title: Remove StringTools compatibility package dependencies on .NET 7.
body:
### Context

These packages are inbox on .NET 7 and not needed.

### Changes Made

Removed `System.Memory` and `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe` when targeting .NET 7+.

### Testing

N/A, no executable code was changed.

### Notes

commit.message: Remove StringTools compatibility package dependencies on .NET 7.
